Token.Pseudo.Notification.NameMustBeUniq: A token with this name already exists
Token.Pseudo.Notification.DeleteFailed: Could not revoke the token. Check that the token is not already revoked or try again in several minutes.
Token.Notification.Text.ClipboardDenied: The token is copied to the clipboard
Token.Notification.Text.CopiedToClipboar: Configure a secure connection to copy the token to the clipboard
Token.ListPage.Header.Title: Access tokens
Token.ListPage.Table.Text.AccessToken: You will not be able to view or copy the token after reloading the page
Token.ListPage.Text.EmptyResult: Create a token for accessing the API
Token.CreateForm.Label.Name: Name
Token.CreateForm.Text.Permissions: If your role changes, the token privileges will change accordingly
Token.CreateForm.Text.Unavailable: Not available for the current role
Token.DeleteModal.Content.Title: Revoke the access token?
Token.DeleteModal.Content.Text: You will not be able to use the token. To regain access to the API, you will need to create a new token.
Token.RevokeModal.Content.Title: Revoke all access tokens?
Token.RevokeModal.Content.Text: You will not be able to use all tokens. To regain access to the API, you will need to create new tokens.
